tool.name: Extract supplementary alignments
tool.description: from SAM/BAM alignment files as FASTQ
tool.help:
.. code-block::
Usage: write_supplementary_fastq [OPTIONS]
Write all supplementary alignments in `input_path` to an output fastq file at `output_path`.
Options: --input_path PATH Collect supplementary reads in this alignment file. --output_path PATH Write supplementary reads to this FASTQ file. --help Show this message and exit.
